general.delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

clientsettings.test_message: Hi this is a test message

pidSettings.pidLoopTime_tooltip: The time in seconds between PID calculations, since water heating is a slow process this also works best when slow ex. 60sec
pidSettings.stepInterval_tooltip: The time between steps less means more substeps will be added
pidSettings.boost_until_tooltip:
Ignore PID until this % is reached, then wait for temp drop and restart PID.
Boost must also be set at schedule step
Set to 0 to disable)
pidSettings.heater_limit_tooltip: Limits PID controlled heater power at this %. Boost overrides this limit
pidSettings.heater_cycles_tooltip:
Number of heater cycles during a PID cycle. 
The more, shorter heater cycles the less fluctuaion of heater element temperature, however the more frequent relay switches
pidSettings.relay_guard_tooltip: Minimum On/Off state time for relays to avoid useless short glitches. (% of heater cycle time)

wifiSettings.msg_wait: Please be patient, scanning in progress...
wifiSettings.access_point_modeDesc: When enabled a wifi network is created by ESP-Brew-Engine, to connect to your own network turn this off!

tempSettings.name: Name
tempSettings.msg_scan: Please be patient, scanning in progress...

import.name: Name
import.temporary_tooltip: By default imports are not saved to flash and only kept in memory, only disable this if you want to save the schedules permanently.
import.no_recipes: No Recipes found in Beer XML!

systemSettings.mash_cant_be_converted: Mash Schedules are not automaticly converted, please update then manualy!
systemSettings.stir_pin_tooltip: IO Number for Stir/Pump (Optional), Set to 0 to disable
systemSettings.buzzer_pin_tooltip: IO Number for Buzzer (Optional), Set to 0 to disable buzzer
systemSettings.speaker1_pin_tooltip: IO Number for speaker driver output, Set to 0 to disable speaker
IO Number for complementer speaker driver output
systemSettings.mqtt_tooltip: Mqtt Uri, this must start with mqtt:// and can contail an optional username/password. if you use a ipv6 address ->  mqtt://user:password@[0001:0001:0001:0001:0001:0001:0001:0001]:1883
systemSettings.factory_reset_text:
Are you sure you want te reset all device settings?
This will also include wifi settings, you will have to reconnect!
systemSettings.recovery_text: To update firmware the device first needs to be booted into recovery mode
